about_the_game:
Welcome to your own cozy little coffee shop! In this 3D top-down simulation game, you get to design, decorate, and manage your own coffee shop in a charming, low-stress environment. Choose your furniture, layout, and equipment, and build your dream cafe just the way you like it. From the coffee machine to the paintings on the walls, every detail is up to you.



But running a coffee shop isn't just about designing the perfect space. You'll need to serve drinks and pastries to your customers, taking orders and customizing drinks to their liking. But don't worry, it's a chill job - you can take as much time as you need, and your customers will be patient and understanding.



In fact, the game is designed to be a relaxing, no-stress experience. With soft music and charming graphics, you can unwind and enjoy the simple pleasures of running your own business. There's no time limit or score to worry about - just focus on making your customers happy and creating a warm, inviting atmosphere.



The game features a online multiplayer mode so when you're ready to take a break from managing your shop, you can go online and meet other coffee shop owners. Visit other players' shops and see how they've decorated and managed their space. You can even trade tips and tricks, and make new friends along the way. If you have some friends nearby you can also play offline multiplayer, with 2 players in the same keyboard or up to 8 players using gamepads.



With dozens of machines, furniture and decoration options, coffee and pastry recipes, and a variety of cute, quirky characters to meet, Capybarista is perfect for anyone who loves cozy spaces, sweet treats, and low-pressure gameplay. So come on in, grab a cup of coffee, and make yourself at home - we're happy to have you here in our little corner of the world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or higher
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 740 / Radeon R7 250 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: If you would like to play local multiplayer with more than 2 players gamepads are required.
